Class ChunkSnapshotModel

java.lang.Object
com.conquest.arenaHandler.regenerationHandler.regenerationModels.ChunkSnapshotModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ChunkSnapshotModel extends Object implements Serializable
📦 Represents a snapshot of all blocks within a single chunk (X/Z), used during arena capture and regeneration.
See Also:
